description: Numbers that are congruent to {0, 1, 2, 5} mod 6.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,0,1,-1).
formula: From _Colin Barker_, May 14 2012: (Start)a(n) = (-7+(-1)^n+(1+i)*(-i)^n+(1-i)*i^n+6*n)/4 where i=sqrt(-1).G.f.: x^2*(1+x+3*x^2+x^3)/((1-x)^2*(1+x)*(1+x^2)). (End)a(n) = a(n-1) + a(n-4) - a(n-5). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, May 15 2012
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[0, 1, 2, 5, 6]; [n le 5 select I[n] else Self(n-1)+Self(n-4)-Self(n-5): n in [1..70]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, May 15 2012(PARI) x='x+O('x^100); concat(0, Vec(x^2*(1+x+3*x^2+x^3)/((1-x)^2*(1+x)*(1+x^2)))) \\ _Altug Alkan_, Dec 24 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
